rows.heading: Importance of toilets
rows.description:
* It promotes health because they allow people to dispose of their waste appropriately. 
* It prevents contamination of the environment.

rows.heading: The disadvantage of not using toilets
rows.description:
* It results in an unhealthy environment contaminated by human waste. 
* It contributes to the spread of many diseases that can cause widespread illness and death.

rows.heading: How to maintain toilets
rows.description:
* Clean it regularly with detergents, antiseptic toilet cleaner, and brushes to scrub away the dirt on the surface.
 
* Make sure you leave the latrine door open for about ten minutes after cleaning to allow in the fresh air. 

* Keep the floor dry. 

* Wash hands thoroughly with soap and water before stepping out.
